Back to Franz Liszt

Franz Liszt

Fünf ungarische Volkslieder, S. 245

1873 · LW A263 · R. 108

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 5' 30"

  • 1. D major
  • 2. G major
  • 3. G major
  • 4. C-sharp minor
  • 5. F minor

These are arrangements of folk songs by Kornél Ábrányi.

Recommended editions

  • New Liszt Edition (Editio Musica Budapest) · II/13 · Z. A/B 12402 · Free Arrangements XIII · ed. Péter Bozó / Adrienne Kaczmarczyk
  • Associated Board · Twenty-one Short Piano Pieces · ed. Howard Ferguson

1. D major

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 3

2. G major

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

3. G major

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 2.5

4. C-sharp minor

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 2.5

5. F minor

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5
